headline: Ecolab Expands Partnership with The Home Depot to Launch Exclusive Product Line in Canada
summary: ST. PAUL, Minn., November 04, 2025--Ecolab Inc., a global sustainability leader offering water, hygiene and infection prevention solutions and services that protect people and the resources vital to life, is proud to announce the expansion of its exclusive partnership with The Home Depot. For the first time, Canadians can shop for cleaning solutions for commercial, industrial, and residential use under the Ecolab® Scientific Clean™ product line at more than 180 Home Depot retail stores across Ca

headline: Water Treatment Chemicals Market Size and Companies Analysis 2025-2034
summary: According to Towards Chemical and Materials, the global water treatment chemicals market size is calculated at USD 40.48 billion in 2025 and is expected to surpass around USD 58.16 billion by 2034, growing at a CAGR of 4.11% from 2025 to 2034. The key market players identified in the report Ecolab (US), Veolia (France), BASF (Germany), Dow (US), Kemira Oyj (Finland), Solenis (US),Solvay (Belgium), Nouryon (The Netherlands)Kurita Water Industries (Japan), SNF Floerger (France), Baker Hughes Compa

headline: Surface Disinfectant Outlook Report 2025-2034: $7.93 Bn Led by Cantel Medical, 3M, Clorox, and Ecolab with Expanding Hygiene and Infection Prevention Solutions
summary: Key opportunities in the global surface disinfectant market include increasing demand driven by rising hygiene awareness, especially in healthcare, and technological advancements leading to innovative, eco-friendly products. The Asia-Pacific market shows rapid growth potential, while North America maintains steady growth.
